abstract: RadioShack files for bankruptcy. | Ally Financial is looking to ramp up performance. | Pfizer makes a big bet on a new class of generics. | Dysfunction continues at GFI.
snippet: RadioShack files for bankruptcy. | Ally Financial is looking to ramp up performance. | Pfizer makes a big bet on a new class of generics. | Dysfunction continues at GFI.
lead_paragraph: RADIOSHACK FILES FOR BANKRUPTCY | RadioShack has filed for bankruptcy, but is poised to live on in a diminished form, Rebecca R. Ruiz and Michael J. de la Merced report in DealBook. The Chapter 11 filing, in federal bankruptcy court in Delaware on Thursday, had long been expected for the 94-year-old electronics retailer, which has not been profitable since 2011.
